data.caption: Audited Financial Results For March 31, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith standalone as well as consolidated Audited Financial Results for the financial year ended March 31, 2023 ('AFR'), along-with the unmodified audit report, as reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors. A declaration pursuant to Regulation 33 (3)(d) of SEBI (LODR), Regulations, 2015 is also enclosed herewith.The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 11:30 a.m. and concluded at 18:45 p.m.
